edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model

Class ParkList

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.get_outdoors.model.ParkList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tabular, java.util.Observer

    public class ParkList
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer, Tabular
    A container object for Park objects. Uses a SortedLinkedList as an underlying data structure. Has a composition relationship with Park objects in the context of GetOutdoors, as Park objects are only constructed through ParkList.addPark(). ParkList is both OBSERVABLE by GetOutdoorsManager and an OBSERVER of Park. ParkList also implements the Tabular interface to output its data as an array for easy display via the UI classes.
    Author:
    Noah Benveniste

    • Constructor Detail

      • ParkList

        public ParkList()
        Constructs a ParkList with a default name of "Parks". Initializes the numParks field and constructs an empty SortedLinkedList of Park objects for the underlying list data structure. Observers of ParkList are notified of construction.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the name of the ParkList.
        Returns:
        the name.

      • addPark

        public boolean addPark(java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String description,
                       double snowChange)
        Adds a Park to the ParkList if it is not already on the list. Auto generates a unique ID. Observers of ParkList are notified of the change.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the Park
        description - the description for the Park
        snowChange - the amount of snow that fell/melted
        Returns:
        true if the Park was added successfully, false otherwise i.e. it was already in the list

      • getParkAt

        public Park getParkAt(int index)
        Gets a Park at a specified index
        Parameters:
        index - the index of the Park to find in the ParkList
        Returns:
        the Park at the specified index
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the specified index is not between 0 and size - 1

      • size

        public int size()
        Gets the number of Parks in the list
        Returns:
        the size of the ParkList

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the ParkList is empty i.e. contains no Parks
        Returns:
        true if the ParkList contains no Parks, false otherwise

      • indexOfID

        public int indexOfID(java.lang.String id)
        Finds the index of a Park by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the Park
        Returns:
        the index of the Park corresponding to the ID in the list, -1 if the list doesn't contain a Park corresponding to the ID

      • get2DArray

        public java.lang.Object[][] get2DArray()
        Generates a 2D array containing the data for each Park in the list. Each row in the array corresponds to an individual Park. The first column stores the ID, the second the name, the third the description and the fourth the snow change.
        Specified by:
        get2DArray in interface Tabular
        Returns:
        a 2D object Array containing data for all Parks in the ParkList

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Notifies observers of ParkList when a change is made
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
        Parameters:
        o - the observable object, in this case a Park
        arg - the observer, in this case GetOutdoorsManager
